Description: Unique id representing a release, compiled_release or record
Position of the party in the parties array
Either release, compiled_release, record, embedded_release. compiled_releases are releases generated by Kingfisher release compilation
Release id from the data. Relevant for releases and not for compiled_releases or records
id for the "data" table in Kingfisher that holds the original JSON data.
